post.title: xbox live, compass 597 u and cradlepoint router.
post.content: i have the compass 597 u and would like to pay xboxlive using it. i was going to get a cradlepoint router. either the ctr350 (if i wanna go wireless) http://www.cradlepoint.com/ctr350/ctr350.php or the mbr1000 (if i wanna connect using an ethernet cable) http://www.cradlepoint.com/mbr1000/mbr1000.php im in a rev a area and get extremely fast internet speeds. so my question is, before i go out and get the router, will i be able to (with out lag) play xbox live? please let me know. thanks!!
